propose.from sentence: Towards this end , we propose deep neural network models , which adapt the convolutional strategy ( proven successful on image and speech ) to natural language .

can naturally host: simple - to - comprehensive fusion of matching patterns

To further explore.from sentence: To further explore the relation between representing sentences and matching them , we devise a novel model that can naturally host both the hierarchical composition for sentences and the simple - to - comprehensive fusion of matching patterns with the same convolutional architecture .
